Name: Don-Crest
LongDescription: Slightly raises Special Attack and Special Defense. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Phanpy and Donphan.  You can get a Don-Crest at the Croagunk Swap Shop if you offer a Donphan Fang and a Donphan Card. What will happen if you bring these three items together...?
